Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6197 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.30.3-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6197 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.30.3-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.30.3-2, affected by CVE-2024-6197
